name: Apoli Side Table
description: The Apoli side table by Kifu Paris is both dramatic and organic in its unique design. The cream shagreen inlaid top sits on an ethereal geometric and sculptural bronze-patina brass base. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. Part of the Apoli Capsule Series. Handmade with an antique natural shagreen surface and bronze-patina brass legs. Wipe clean with a soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines.
